DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate effect pelvic floor muscle training ( PFMT ) Lower Urinary Tract Symptoms ( LUTS ) men stroke . 120 men LUTS increase LUTS stroke include randomized treatment group control group . The subject treatment group follow 12 week standard PFMT program , control group give specific treatment LUTS like treatment group follow standard rehabilitation program stroke patient . Outcome measure - 5 questionnaire - Voiding diary - 24-hour pad test - pelvic floor muscle assessment test
DOC.brief_title: Pelvic Floor Muscle Training ( PFMT ) Lower Urinary Tract Symptoms ( LUTS ) Men With Stroke
DOC.criteria: 1 . Men , diagnose stroke clinical define accord World Health Organisation ( WHO 1989 ) confirm CT MRI scan 2 . Onset last stroke â‰¥ 1 month 3 . Normal cognitive function ( minimal mental examination score > 25 ) ( Folstein , Folstein et al . 1976 ) . 4 . LUTS accord ICS definition ( Abrams , Cardozo et al . 2002 ) , start aggravation close relation stroke 5 . Independent walk ability indoor > 100 with/without aid 6 . Independence toilet visit 7 . Age > 18 year 1 . Prior history LUTS surgery , pelvic surgery trauma 2 . More 2 hospital diagnose stroke 3 . Other severe neurological disease include dementia 4 . Severe dysphasia 5 . Severe psychiatric disease 6 . Prostate cancer 7 . Do speak Danish English
